alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 10 at 5:38AM AKST until December 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts may form. Power outages may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected from Elim to Koyuk. Areas south of Koyuk will see 1 to 3 inches of snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
